Class Savings

java.lang.Object
Account
Savings
public class Savings
extends Account
This class is a child class of the Account class. It represents all the Savings bank account
Author:
John Juarez, Rudra Kakadia

    • Savings

      public Savings​(Profile holder, double balance, Date dateOpen)
      The constructor calls the super constructor to intialize the account holder, balance, and dateOpen fields
      Parameters:
      holder - - the profile object that represents a person opening an account
      balance - - the amount that the person initially deposits into the bank
      dateOpen - - the date when the account is being opened
